meanings: shocking, unconventional; (예외적인) exceptional; (전례 없는) unprecedented; (특별한) extraordinary, special
make an exception of one´s case[in one´s favor]

examples.korean: The band were famous for their preposterous clothes and haircuts. 발음듣기 그 밴드는 파격적인 옷차림과 머리 모양으로 유명했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The band were famous for their preposterous clothes and haircuts. 발음

examples.korean: We offer an outstanding price for our items and look forward to see you at my store. 발음듣기 저희 가게에서는 파격적인 가격으로 여러분을 모십니다! YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We offer an outstanding price for our items and look forward to see you at my store. 발음

examples.korean: He demanded a significant[substantial] raise. 발음듣기 그는 파격적인 임금 인상을 요구했다 Neungyule
examples.english: He demanded a significant[substantial] raise. 발음

examples.korean: He received an incredible offer when he was recruited. 발음듣기 그는 파격적인 조건으로 스카우트되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: He received an incredible offer when he was recruited. 발음

examples.korean: The provocativeness of the way she dresses always has been controversial. 발음듣기 그녀의 파격적인 의상은 늘 화제가 되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: The provocativeness of the way she dresses always has been controversial. 발음
